nodes.text: The Sith sniper rifle was a blaster rifle customized with the necessary specifications to serve as a standard sniper rifle for the Sith Empire during the Jedi Civil War. Though the rifle excelled in this modified role, the Sith rarely put them to use as they preferred close-range combat.

In 3956 BBY, Kebla Yurt of Kebla Yurt's Equipment Emporium had a Sith sniper rifle in her inventory priced at 1,500 credits. In the same year, at least one other was stored at the Sith Academy on Korriban.
